name: Gunhook Online
description:
- Updated Titlescreen with easier Color Customization.
- Added controls sensitivity slider option
- Slower Gunhook swing
- Added fire rate for Gunhook

Gunhook Online is an online multiplayer 3D shooter with grappling hook twist. Right click to fire your grappling hook to walls and dash towards it! Aim with mouse and hold Left click to shoot (slow fire rate). Press Left click multiple times for rapid fire! Move with WASD or Arrow keys.

NEW FEATURES

  • Live room leaderboard
  • Color customization
  • Up to 8 players per room.
  • Changed best score from total kills to kills streak. Death now becomes relevant.
  • Room best score is saved for the rest of the players in the room to see.

* Idle players are sent back to menu

* Backspace key to return to menu

* Other bugs and fixes

TO BE ADDED:

Who killed who UI

Health pickups

Shield pickups

Weapon pickups
